Actions.Name: Headbutt
Actions.Effect: Foe must save or become winded. Deals 2[D] against Grabbed foes

Actions.Name: Grab
Actions.Description: An adjacent foe must save or become grabbed by the Crusher. If they're winded, they fail the save. While grabbed, their max speed is 0, they take [D] piercing damage at the start of their turns, and the crusher cannot move. If shoved or moved apart, or the crusher grabs a new target, the grab ends.
